item.title: 象牙海岸总统希望在 2026 年前实现地区共同货币化
item.description: 象牙海岸总统阿拉萨内-瓦塔拉希望西非国家经济共同体成员国提前一年开始使用共同货币。【原文：Ivory Coast President Alassane Ouattara wants members of the Economic Community of West African States to start a common currency a year earlier than planned.】

item.title: 第六街和 Bridgepoint 是克莱因山的竞争者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Sixth Street、Bridgepoint Group Plc 和 First Eagle Investment Management 等公司都在争相收购 Kline Hill Partners。【原文：Sixth Street, Bridgepoint Group Plc and First Eagle Investment Management are among suitors vying to acquire Kline Hill Partners, a firm focused on secondaries bets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 奇趣通讯奥斯汀-古尔斯比讲述刚刚发生的故事
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 贝莱德携 4,500 亿美元另类资产加入新联盟
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的另类资产规模达到 4,500 亿美元，这使它全年都在宣传的一个观点更加清晰：它不仅仅是一家 ETF 强国。【原文：BlackRock Inc. reaching $450 billion in alternative assets is putting a finer point on a case it has been making all year: it’s not just an ETF powerhouse.】

item.title: 奥德赛就收购霍尼韦尔面罩部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Odyssey Investment Partners 正在就收购霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：Odyssey Investment Partners is in advanced talks to acquire Honeywell International Inc.’s personal protective equipment unit, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 上游生物股价上涨 26%，引领生命科学领域 IPO 热潮
item.description: 在投资者大力支持三家美国生命科学公司首次公开发行股票后，它们在早盘交易中的表现大多十分强劲。【原文：Three US life-sciences companies hitting the market delivered mostly robust early trading after investors strongly supported their initial public offerings.】

item.title: 这款电子游戏将民主带入奇幻王国
item.description:
在Metaphor：在Persona制作人推出的新游戏ReFantazio中，您将参加竞选，成为下一任国王

。【原文：

In Metaphor: ReFantazio, the new game from the makers of Persona, you run in an election to become the next king

】

item.title: 飓风引发网上造谣者对选民身份的密谋
item.description:
州政府官员正在采取措施，确保最近的飓风不会阻碍任何人参加投票。【原文：

State officials are taking steps to ensure recent hurricanes won't prevent anyone from being able to vote.

】

item.title: 利率下降对摩根大通和富国银行来说并不像人们担心的那么糟糕
item.description: 几个月来，投资者一直担心美联储为美国经济软着陆所做的努力会给美国大型银行的盈利带来麻烦。【原文：For months, investors had been worried that the Federal Reserve’s effort to engineer a soft landing for the US economy would spell trouble for the earnings of big US banks.】

item.title: 如何进行抵押贷款再融资
item.description:
买房通常意味着要向银行支付数年的月供。但是，这些条款竟然可以讨价还价—；用现有利率换取更低的利率，可以为您节省数千美元。【原文：

Buying a house usually means years of monthly payments to a bank. But the terms are surprisingly negotiable — and trading your existing rate for a lower one can save you thousands of dollars.

】

item.title: ABC 技术公司在截止日期前提高德州仪器流体报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ABC 科技控股公司在收购期限即将到来之前提高了收购英国汽车零部件供应商 TI 流体系统公司的报价。【原文：ABC Technologies Holdings Inc. has increased its offer to buy UK automotive components supplier TI Fluid Systems Plc ahead of a looming takeover deadline, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加纳重组后的欧洲债券在交易第二天获得收益
item.description: 在惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将加纳重组后的欧洲债券评定为 "无违约 "后，这些债券在第二个交易日出现上涨。【原文：Ghana’s restructured Eurobonds rose on the second day of trading after Fitch Ratings assessed the notes as out of default.】

item.title: 交易员等待大选，比特币迎来异常平静的 "Uptober
item.description: 由于交易商仍在观望即将到来的美国大选结果，比特币进入了一个异常平静的时期。【原文：Bitcoin has settled into an unusually calm period, as traders remain on the sidelines awaiting the outcome of the upcoming US election.】

item.title: 美联储主席洛根再次呼吁 "循序渐进 "地降低利率
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根坚持她的观点，即利率应该以缓慢的速度上升到一个更正常的水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan stuck by her view that interest rates should move at a slow pace to a more normal level.】

item.title: 惠誉认为高校预算压力加大
item.description: 惠誉评级公司预测，美国高校的财务前景将更加黯淡，其中规模较小的私立学校受到的冲击最大。【原文：Fitch Ratings predicts an even gloomier financial outlook for US colleges and universities, with smaller private schools being hit the hardest.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体集会引来大选后看涨期权押注
item.description: 随着特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）延续涨势，股价自 9 月下旬以来已上涨了一倍多，同时也吸引了看涨期权的押注。【原文：As Trump Media & Technology Group extended a rally that’s more than doubled the share price since late September, it’s drawing in bullish options bets along the way.】

item.title: Nordic Capital 探索支付公司 Trustly 的各种选择
item.description: 熟知内情的人士透露，Nordic Capital 正在探索瑞典数字支付公司 Trustly Group AB 的各种选择，包括潜在的出售或首次公开募股。【原文：Nordic Capital is exploring options for Swedish digital payments company Trustly Group AB including a potential sale or initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Blackstone 出售以仓库为抵押的加拿大抵押债券
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 出售了以多伦多和蒙特利尔等地区仓库为抵押的加拿大抵押债券，这对加元市场来说是一笔不寻常的交易。【原文：Blackstone Inc. sold Canadian mortgage bonds backed by warehouses in areas including Toronto and Montreal, an unusual transaction for the Canadian dollar market.】

item.title: 国防和航天公司合作研制轨道飞行器以执行国家安全任务
item.description: 由风险投资支持的 Impulse Space 公司和武器制造商 Anduril Industries 公司正在开发一种增压间谍飞行器，能够在轨道上为美国政府及其盟国执行国家安全任务。【原文：Venture-backed Impulse Space Inc. and weapons maker Anduril Industries Inc. are developing a supercharged spy vehicle capable of carrying out national security missions in orbit for the US government and its allies.】

item.title: 梅洛尼官员急于为意大利预算截止日期增加收入
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的政府在最后一刻急于寻找新的增收途径，因为它要为向意大利选民承诺的赠款提供资金。【原文：Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government faces a last-minute rush to find new ways of raising revenue as it seeks to fund promised giveaways to Italian voters, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员减少美联储减息押注，美元延续周线升势
item.description: 由于预计美联储将放慢降息步伐，交易商正推动美元连续第二周上涨。【原文：Traders are pushing the dollar toward its second-straight weekly gain in anticipation of a slower pace of interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 中国因涉嫌贿赂调查苹果手机城的台湾员工
item.description: 据北京国台办消息，中国当局正在调查苹果公司的主要组装合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司的四名台湾员工，他们涉嫌包括贿赂在内的犯罪活动。【原文：Chinese authorities are investigating four Taiwanese employees at Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Apple Inc.’s main assembly partner, for suspected criminal activities including bribery, according to Beijing’s Taiwan Affairs Office.】

item.title: 尼日利亚签署为价值 33 亿美元的甲醇厂供应天然气的协议
item.description: 尼日利亚国家石油公司（Nigerian National Petroleum Corp.）与壳牌、道达尔能源（TotalEnergies）和阿吉普（Agip）等合作伙伴达成了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，向该国黄铜化肥石化有限公司（Brass Fertilizer & Petrochemical Co.Ltd.【原文：Nigerian National Petroleum Corp. and partners including Shell, TotalEnergies and Agip struck a landmark deal to sell gas to the methanol-manufacturing project of the country’s Brass Fertilizer & Petrochemical Co. Ltd.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与阿达尼公司签署价值 7.36 亿美元的电力线路项目协议
item.description: 肯尼亚能源部长 Opiyo Wandayi 表示，肯尼亚与阿达尼能源解决方案有限公司签署了一项价值 7.36 亿美元的协议，用于建设三条输电线路。【原文：Kenya signed a $736 million deal with Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. for the construction of three power lines, according to Energy Secretary Opiyo Wandayi.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 在推迟美元债券交易后利用住友贷款
item.description: Ecopetrol SA 在本周推迟在国际市场上出售债券后，正利用与三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation）的贷款偿还其他债务。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is using a loan with Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation to pay down other debt after it postponed the sale of bonds in the international market this week.】

item.title: 美国信贷吸引外国投资者，希望降低避险成本
item.description: 外国投资者一直在购买更多的美国企业债券，随着美联储宽松货币政策降低对冲成本，以及投资者追求收益，这一趋势很可能会持续下去。【原文：Foreign investors have been buying more US corporate bonds, a trend that will likely continue as Federal Reserve monetary easing lowers the cost of hedging and investors hunt for yield.】

item.title: 佩梅克斯公司休斯顿地区炼油厂化学品泄漏造成两人死亡
item.description: 墨西哥国营石油公司在休斯敦地区的一家炼油厂发生化学品泄漏事故，造成 2 人死亡，35 人受伤。【原文：Two people are dead and 35 are injured after a chemical release at a Houston area refinery owned by Mexico’s state oil company.】

item.title: 卢拉提出扩大所得税免税范围，巴西雷亚尔下挫
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）表示，他希望在现有承诺的基础上对工资不超过5000雷亚尔（893美元）的工人实行更大的所得税减免，这加剧了投资者对财政政策的担忧。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said he wants bigger income tax exemptions beyond his existing pledge for workers with salaries of up to 5,000 reais ($893), adding to investor worries about fiscal policy.】

item.title: 奥斯坦-古尔斯比解读美联储大幅降息
item.description:
以及现在的风险所在。【原文：

And where the risks are now.

】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙竞选财政部长：永不褪色的理念
item.description:
这位摩根大通老板的名字已经流传了25年。在这次总统竞选中，他的呼声一如既往地高，甚至戴蒙本人也在淡化这种可能性。【原文：

The JPMorgan boss’s name has been floated for 25 years. This presidential race, the chatter is as loud as ever—even as Dimon himself downplays the chances.

】
